title: 1858: How to Build Muscle With Kettlebells, Using Strength Training to Reduce Arthritis Pain, the Ideal Order to Complete MAPS Fitness Programs & More
description:
In this episode of Quah (Q & A), Sal, Adam & Justin answer four Pump Head questions drawn from last Sunday’s Quah post on the @mindpumpmedia Instagram page.

  • Mind Pump Fit Tip: Contrary to popular media propaganda, meat, eggs, and milk are the most nutrient-dense foods on the planet! (3:11)
  • Sal has stamped his seal of approval on Seed. (13:35)
  • Adam’s Organifi “Peanut” Brittle desert. (16:52)
  • Sal recommends UnXplained with William Shatner. (21:13)
  • Justin recommends Westworld on HBO. (33:57)
  • Another brilliant move by Apple. (35:45)
  • That one-time Disney gave Robin Williams a Picasso for being the Genie. (40:35)
  • Is your favorite Hollywood star on anabolics? (44:25)
  • #Quah question #1 - What order should your programs be completed? (57:17)
  • #Quah question #2 - Can kettlebells build muscle? (1:06:44)
  • #Quah question #3 - How would you describe training to technical failure to someone who doesn’t push themselves hard enough? (1:14:20)
  • #Quah question #4 - What are the benefits of strength training with arthritis? (1:19:10)
